admission:
🎓 **Admission Process - Step by Step Guide**

Our admission process is simple and student-friendly:

**📝 STEP 1: Online Application**
• Visit our official website: www.college.edu.in
• Click on "Apply Now" button
• Fill the online application form with accurate details
• Upload required documents (scanned copies)
• Pay the application fee online

**📄 STEP 2: Document Verification**
• Submit original documents at admission office
• Documents will be verified by our admission committee
• You'll receive a verification receipt

**📝 STEP 3: Entrance Examination (if applicable)**
• Appear for entrance test on scheduled date
• Bring your admit card and ID proof
• Results will be declared within 7 days

**🎤 STEP 4: Personal Interview/Counseling**
• Shortlisted candidates called for interview
• Counseling for course and specialization selection
• Merit list published on website

**💳 STEP 5: Fee Payment**
• Pay admission fee within stipulated time
• Collect fee receipt and admission letter
• Submit original documents for final verification

**📚 STEP 6: Enrollment Confirmation**
• Complete enrollment formalities
• Collect student ID card
• Join orientation program

**⏰ Processing Time:** 2-3 weeks from application

**💡 Pro Tip:** Apply early to avoid last-minute rush!

Need help with any specific step? Just ask!

eligibility:
✅ **Eligibility Criteria - Admission Requirements**

**🎓 UNDERGRADUATE PROGRAMS**

**For B.Tech/BE:**
• Passed 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics
• Minimum 50% aggregate (45% for SC/ST/OBC)
• Valid JEE Main/State CET score
• Age: Maximum 25 years as of admission date

**For BBA/BCA:**
• Passed 10+2 in any stream
• Minimum 50% aggregate (45% for reserved categories)
• Mathematics in 10+2 preferred for BCA
• Age: 17-23 years

**For B.Sc:**
• Passed 10+2 with Science stream
• Minimum 50% in PCM/PCB
• Age: Maximum 22 years

**For B.Com:**
• Passed 10+2 in any stream (Commerce preferred)
• Minimum 45% aggregate
• Age: Maximum 22 years

**For BA:**
• Passed 10+2 in any stream
• Minimum 40% aggregate
• Age: Maximum 22 years

**📚 POSTGRADUATE PROGRAMS**

**For M.Tech:**
• Bachelor's degree in Engineering/Technology
• Minimum 55% aggregate (50% for reserved)
• Valid GATE score
• Age: Maximum 28 years

**For MBA:**
• Bachelor's degree in any discipline
• Minimum 50% aggregate
• Valid CAT/MAT/XAT/CMAT score
• Age: Maximum 30 years
• Work experience preferred but not mandatory

**For M.Sc:**
• Bachelor's degree in relevant subject
• Minimum 55% aggregate
• Age: Maximum 25 years

**For MCA:**
• Bachelor's degree in any stream
• Mathematics at 10+2 or Graduation level
• Minimum 55% aggregate
• Valid entrance test score

**🌍 INTERNATIONAL STUDENTS:**
• Valid passport
• Student visa
• Proof of English proficiency (TOEFL/IELTS)
• Equivalence certificate from AIU
• Valid student visa

**♿ SPECIAL PROVISIONS:**
• Relaxation of 5% marks for PWD candidates
• Age relaxation of 3 years for reserved categories
• Sports quota: State/National level participation
• NCC/NSS certificate holders: Bonus points

**📋 GENERAL REQUIREMENTS (All Programs):**
• Indian citizen or OCI card holder
• Medical fitness certificate
• No academic gap more than 2 years (valid reason required)
• Clear criminal record

**❓ ELIGIBILITY CHECK:**
Not sure if you're eligible? Share your:
• Qualification details
• Marks/percentage
• Category (if applicable)

I'll help you check your eligibility!

**📞 For clarification:** admissions@college.edu.in

scholarship:
🎓 **Scholarship & Financial Aid - Make Education Affordable**

We believe financial constraints should never hinder a deserving student's education!

**💰 MERIT-BASED SCHOLARSHIPS**

**🏆 Excellence Scholarship (Academic)**
• Eligibility: 90%+ in qualifying exam
• Coverage: 100% tuition fee waiver
• Duration: Entire course (subject to maintaining 8.5 CGPA)
• Number: Top 10 students per program

**🥇 Merit Scholarship**
• Tier 1 (85-90%): 50% tuition fee waiver
• Tier 2 (80-85%): 30% tuition fee waiver
• Tier 3 (75-80%): 20% tuition fee waiver
• Duration: Entire course (maintain 7.5 CGPA)
• Number: 100 scholarships per year

**📚 Rank Holder Scholarship**
• Eligibility: JEE/GATE/CAT rank holders
• Top 100 rank: 75% tuition fee waiver
• Rank 101-500: 50% tuition fee waiver
• Rank 501-1000: 25% tuition fee waiver
• Duration: First year (renewable based on performance)

**💸 NEED-BASED SCHOLARSHIPS**

**🤝 Financial Assistance Program**
• Eligibility: Family income < ₹3 lakhs/year
• Coverage: Up to 70% total fee waiver
• Includes: Tuition + Hostel + Mess
• Documents: Income certificate, Bank statements
• Number: 200 students per year

**👨‍👩‍👧 Economically Weaker Section (EWS)**
• Eligibility: EWS certificate holder
• Coverage: 40% tuition fee waiver
• Duration: Entire course
• Additional: Free study material

**🎯 First Generation Learner Scholarship**
• Eligibility: First in family to attend college
• Coverage: 50% total fees
• Special: Mentorship program included
• Number: 50 students per year

**🏃 SPORTS & TALENT SCHOLARSHIPS**

**⚽ Sports Excellence Scholarship**
• National level players: 75% fee waiver
• State level players: 50% fee waiver
• District level players: 25% fee waiver
• International players: 100% fee waiver + stipend

✅ Document Quality:

**2️⃣ Physical Submission:**

**📅 SUBMISSION TIMELINE**

• Online upload: During application

• Late submission: ₹500 late fee per day

**⚠️ IMPORTANT NOTES**

   • College will keep photocopies

2. **Document Verification:**
   • Committee verifies all documents
   • False information leads to cancellation
   • Cross-checking with issuing authority

3. **Missing Documents:**
   • Provisional admission possible
   • Submit within 30 days
   • Extended deadline with valid reason
   • Admission cancelled if not submitted

4. **Document Return:**
   • After course completion
   • Student ID required
   • No-dues certificate mandatory
   • Parent/Student can collect

5. **Lost Documents:**
   • FIR required
   • Affidavit on stamp paper
   • Duplicate document from issuing authority
   • Processing fee applicable

📝 **Entrance Examination Details - Complete Guide**

**🎯 ENTRANCE EXAM OVERVIEW**

For admission to various programs, entrance examinations may be required based on the course and your qualification.

**📚 EXAM REQUIREMENTS BY PROGRAM**

**🔧 ENGINEERING (B.Tech/BE):**
**Accepted Exams:**
• JEE Main (Primary)
• State CET (State Quota)
• Institution Entrance Test (Management Quota)

**Minimum Score:**
• JEE Main: Percentile 60+ (General), 50+ (Reserved)
• State CET: Rank within 50,000
• Institution Test: Pass marks (40%)

**📊 MANAGEMENT (MBA):**
**Accepted Exams:**
• CAT (Preferred)
• MAT
• XAT
• CMAT
• GMAT (International)
• Institution Entrance Test

**Minimum Percentile:**
• CAT: 60+ (General), 50+ (Reserved)
• MAT: 400+ score
• Others: As per merit

**💻 COMPUTER APPLICATIONS (BCA/MCA):**
**For BCA:**
• Institution Entrance Test (Mandatory)
• Topics: Mathematics, Logical Reasoning, English

**For MCA:**
• NIMCET (Preferred)
• State CET
• Institution Entrance Test

**🔬 SCIENCE (B.Sc/M.Sc):**
• Generally no entrance exam
• Admission based on merit
• M.Sc: Subject-specific entrance test

**🎓 M.TECH:**
**Mandatory:**
• GATE (Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering)
• Valid GATE score required
• Minimum: 350+ (out of 1000)

**⚖️ LAW (BA LLB/BBA LLB):**
**Accepted Exams:**
• CLAT (Common Law Admission Test)
• LSAT
• Institution Entrance Test

**📖 INSTITUTION ENTRANCE TEST**

**🎯 Test Name:** [College Name] Admission Test (CAT)

**For Courses:**
• B.Tech (Management Quota)
• BBA/BCA

**Exam Pattern:**

**Duration:** 2 hours (120 minutes)

**Total Questions:** 120
• Quantitative Aptitude: 40 questions
• Logical Reasoning: 40 questions
• English Language: 40 questions

**Marking Scheme:**
• Each correct answer: +3 marks
• Wrong answer: -1 mark (negative marking)

**Question Types:**
• Multiple Choice Questions (MCQ)

• Numerical Answer Type (NAT)

**3. English Language:**
